Technical introduction to robust statistics in multivariate analysis Notation Affine equivariance The multivariate M-estimate The multivariate S-estimates and the MVE estimate The multivariate L-estimates of scale the MCD estimate The multivariate MM-estimate

Regression Data Sets
Multivariate Data Sets
Bibliography
Functions
Dynamic Statistical Visualization add2spm - Add objects to the scatter plot matrix cdsplot - Candlestick plot for robust model selection covplot - Forward plot of the monitoring of the trajectories of elements of the covariance (correlation) matrix fanplot - Forward plot of the monitoring of the score test statistic histFS - plots a histogram with the elements in each bin grouped according to a vector of labels. levfwdplot - Plots the trajectories of leverage along the search malfwdplot - Plots the trajectories of Mahalanobis distances along the search malindexplot - Plots the Mahalanobis distances against index number or any other variable mdrplot - Plots the trajectory of minimum deletion residual (mdr) along the search mmdplot - Plots the trajectory of minimum Mahalanobis distance (mmd) along the search olsline - Add least-squares fit line(s) to scatter plot(s) resfwdplot - Plots the trajectories of scaled (squared) residuals along the search resindexplot - Plots the residuals against index number or any other variable selectdataFS - Graphical selection of data points on scatter plot matrices or trajectories in the forward plots using the mouse spmplot - Scatterplot matrix with dynamic scatters and histograms yXplot - Graphical selection of data points on scatter plot matrices or trajectories in the forward plots using the mouse
Robust linear regression and transformations addt - Added t test FSR - Forward search in linear regression with automatic outlier detection procedure FSRaddt - Forward added t-tests for each explanatory variable FSRbonfbound - Theoretical Bonferroni bounds of minimum deletion residual FSRbsb - Units belonging to the subset in each step of the forward search FSReda - Forward search in linear regression with exploratory data analysis purposes FSRenvmdr - Theoretical envelopes of Minimum Deletion Residual outside subset during the search FSRfan - Score test statistic for transformation in each step of the forward search FSRmdr - Stores minimum deletion residual and other basic regression quantities. LXS - Least Median of Squares or Least Trimmed of squares minscale - Computes minimum value of the scale MMreg - MM estimators in linear regression MMregcore - MM estimators in linear regression Sreg - S estimator in linear regression Score - Score test for transformation
Robust model selection FSRaddt - Forward added t-tests for each explanatory variable FSRcp - Forward Cp for models of interest FSRms - Model selection using Cp
Robust multivariate analysis and transformations FSM - Forward search in multivariate analysis with automatic outlier detection procedure FSMbonfbound - Theoretical Bonferroni bounds of minimum Mahalanobis distance in each step of the forward search. FSMeda - Forward search in multivariate analysis with exploratory data analysis purposes FSMenvmmd - Theoretical envelopes of Minimum Mahalanobis Distance outside subset during the search FSMfan - Multivariate transformations (validation step) FSMmmd - Stores minimum Mahalanobis Distance (uses fast recursive routines) FSMmmdeasy - Stores minimum Mahalanobis Distance (does not use recursive routines) FSMtra - Multivariate transformations (estimation step) mcd - Minimum covariance determinant minscale - Computes minimum value of the scale MMmult - MM estimators in Multivariate Analysis MMmultcore - MM estimators in Multivariate Analysis mve - Minimum volume ellipsoid Smult - S estimators in Multivariate Analysis unibiv - Detects univariate and bivariate outliers.
Interactive demo tools with GUIs BrushRES - Example of interactive brushing starting from the monitoring residual plot BrushFAN - Example of interactive brushing starting from the FAN plot BrushROB - Example of interactive brushing starting from the index plot of robust residuals
Utilities clickableMultiLegend - Make legends clickable in a scatter plot matrix dsxy2figxy - Transform points or positions from axis coords to figure coords ellipse - Draw an ellpse starting from loc vector and scatter matrix FScolors - A MATLAB class encapsulating some common color definitions fsminvmmd - Converts values of minimum Mahalanobis distance into confidence levels fsrinvmdr - Converts values of minimum deletion residual into confidence levels mahalFS - Mahalanobis distances from supplied centroid and covariance matrix normBoxCox - Normalized Box-Cox transformation quickselectfs - Finds the k-th ordered statistic rescale - Rescale data in a given interval TBbdp - Finds constant c of Tukey biweight given breakdown point TBc - Finds breakdownpoint and efficiency given constant c TBeff - Finds constant c of Tukey biweight given nominal efficiency TBpsi - Function ψ(x) for Tukey biweight TBrho - Function ρ(x) for Tukey biweight TBwei - Function w=ψ(x)/x for Tukey biweight
Combinatorial bc - Binomial Coefficient combsFS - All possible combinations of n elements taken k at time nchoosekFS - Binomial coefficient or matrix containing all combinations randsampleFS - Random sample, with or without replacement shuffling - Random permutation of the elements of a vector subsets - Indexes of distinct subsets extracted from a set of n elements
Examples
